tuv.seg: Third-level courses for mature students
Cúrsaí tríú-leibhéal do mhic léinn aibí
Third-level education is becoming increasingly accessible to adults on both a full-time and a part-time basis
Tá sé ag éirí níos furasta i gcónaí do dhaoine fásta theacht ar oideachas tríú-leibhéal ar bhonn páirtaimseartha agus ar bhonn lánaimseartha
Third-level colleges reserve a small number of places specifically for mature students who want to participate in full-time day programmes
Cuireann coláistí tríú leibhéal méid áirithe áiteanna ar leataobh do mhic léinn aibí atá ag iarraidh páirt a ghlacadh i gcláir lánaimseartha laethúil
If you are over 23* you can apply for one of these places
Má tá tú thar aois 23* is féidir leat cur isteach ar cheann de na háiteanna seo
This means that you will compete for your place on a different basis to those who are just leaving school
Ciallaíonn sé seo go mbeidh tú ag déanamh iomaíochta ar áit a fháil duit féin ar bhunús difríúil dóibh siúd atá ag fágáil na scoile
The number of places reserved for mature students are limited, however, so it is likely that you will still have to compete with your peers
Tá teorainn ar an méid áit a chuirtear ar leataobh do mhic léinn aibí, áfach, agus mar sin d'fhéadfá a bheith san iomaíocht le do chomhaoisithe
*Generally,you are considered to be a mature student if you are at least 23 years of age on January 1 of the year you enter your course
* De gnáth, tógtar gur mac léinn aibí thú má tá tú 23 bliain d'aois ar a laghad an 1 Eanáir don bhliain a thosnaíonn tú an cursa
If you are interested in a particular college you should check how it defines a mature student
Má tá suim agat i gcoláiste áirithe, caithfidh tú an sainmhíniú mhac léinn a aimsigh
If you opt for a full-time course in this way, you will be expected to attend classes or lectures every day and you will be assessed in the same way as the other students on your course
Má roghnaíonn tú cúrsa lánaimseartha a dhéanamh sa mbealach seo beidh ort freastal ar ranganna nó ar léachtaí chuile lá, agus measfar tú ar an mbealach céanna le na mic léinn eile ar do chúrsa
However, if the full-time model does not suit you, there are other options available, including part-time courses, modular programmes and distance learning
Muna bhfeileann córas mar sin duit, áfach, tá fáil ar roghanna eile, cúrsaí páirtaimseartha, cláracha modúla agus cianoideachais san áireamh
If you choose to study on a part-time or modular basis, you can spread your studies over a number of years
Má roghnaíonn tú staidéar a dhéanamh ar bhonn páirt-aimseartha nó modúla, is féidir leat a bheith ag staidéar thar tréimhse blianta níos faide
This gives you the opportunity to organise your time and to study in bursts when it is most convenient for you
Tugann sé seo deis duit do chuid ama a eagrú agus diriú ar an staidéar nuair is fearr a fheileann duit féin

It has the obvious drawback that it will take longer to complete than a full-time course, but it also has the advantage that it allows you to work at your own pace, gradually building credits towards your qualification

An mhíbhuntáiste is mó a bhaineann leis, ár ndóigh, ná go dtógfaidh sé achar níos faide ort an chúrsa a chríochnú, ach tá sé de bhuntáiste aige go dtugann sé cead duit a bheith ag obair ag do luas féin agus thú ag fáil do cháilíochtaí de réir a chéile
A modular programme is made up of separate modules, which are self-contained units within a course
Tá clár modúla déanta suas de modúil difríochta, atá gach modúil neamhspleách ann féin taobh istigh den chúrsa
You can study and complete each module separately at different stages during that course
Is féidir leat staidéar a dhéanamh ar gach modúil agus iad a chríochnú iontu féin ag amanna difriúla tríd an gcúrsa
Modular programmes can take place in regular classroom settings or can be part of a distance learning programme
Is féidir cláranna modúla a rith i ghnáth sheomra ranga, nó mar chuid de chúrsa foghlama chianoideachais
The term distance learning covers a wide range of learning programmes that take place away from the physical presence of the classroom and the tutor
Tá réimse leathan chláracha foghlama atá dhá teagasc taobh amuigh den seomra ranga agus gan teagascóir i láthair clúdaithe faoin téarma cianoideachas
If you participate in a distance learning programme, it is likely that you will use a wide range of packaged materials and media throughout your course

Má tá tú ag glacadh páirt i gclár chianoideachais, tá gach seans ann go mbainfidh tú úsaid as réimse leathain de pacáistí ábhair agus ilmheáin tríd an gcúrsa. D'fhéadfadh téipeanna, físeanna agus úsáid an idirlíne a bheith i gceist anseo
Some courses organise periodic classes where students come together for a day, a weekend or a week at a time, in order to study intensively
Eagraíonn cuid de na cúrsaí ranganna ó am go chéile nuair a thagann mic léinn le chéile ar feadh tréimhse lae, nó seachtaine le tréanstaidéar a dhéanamh
University access programmes aim to increase the participation of under-represented groups at third-level
Tá sé de chuspóir ag cláir rochtana ollscoile rannpháirtíocht grúpaí a ndéantar tearcionadaíocht dóibh ar thríú leibhéal a mhéadú
They do this by supporting young adults and mature students to study at third-level colleges
Déanann siad amhlaidh trí thacú le daoine fásta óga agus mic léinn aibí chun staidéar a dhéanamh ag coláistí tríú leibhéal
Students attending access or foundation courses that are on the Department of Education’s approved list of post-leaving certificate courses may be eligible for funding under the Student Grant Scheme

D’fhéadfadh mic léinn atá ag freastal ar chúrsaí rochtana nó bonnchúrsaí atá ar liosta cúrsaí iar-Ardteistiméireachta faofa na Roinne Oideachais a bheith incháilithe chun cistiú a fháil faoi Scéim um Dheontais do Mhic Léinn
However, students attending a foundation or access course in any other college or university will not be eligible for funding
B’fhéidir nach mbeadh mic léinn a fhreastalaíonn ar bhonnchúrsa nó cúrsa rochtana in aon choláiste nó ollscoil eile, áfach, i dteideal cistiú a fháil
An access or foundation course is considered to be a second-level course for the Back to Education Allowance
Meastar gur cúrsa dara leibhéal é cúrsa rochtana nó bonnchúrsa i dtaobh an Liúntais um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas
You should check your options around access programmes with the university of your choice or local Education and Training Board
Ba cheart duit do chuid roghanna a sheiceáil maidir le cláir rochtana le do rogha ollscoile nó Bord Oideachais agus Oiliúna
Generally, you will need to have completed your Leaving Certificate
Go ginearálta, beidh ort an scrúdú Ardteisteiméireachta a bheith déanta agat
However, if you are applying for a place as a mature student, you will not be asked to meet the usual entry requirements
Má tá tú ag cur isteach ar áit mar mhac léinn aibí, ar ndóigh, ní iarrfar ort ghnáthchoinníollacha iontrála a chomhlíonadh

Different courses operate different entry procedures, but, in general, the colleges will take into account your educational background, work history, community involvement and other achievements and interests

Tá riachtanais éagsúla ag na cúrsaí éagsúla, ach, go ginearálta tógfaidh na coláistí do chúlra oideachais, taithí oibre, obair don phobail agus na rudaí eile atá bainte amach agat, chomh maith lena hábhair a chuireann tú spéis iontu san áireamh
This system is known as the Accreditation of Prior Experiential Learning (APEL) or Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL)
Tugtar Creidiúnú Réamhfhoghlama ó Thaithí (APEL) nó Aitheantas Réamhfhoghlama (RPL) ar an gcóras seo
It is useful to find out whether the college of your choice uses the APEL system before you apply
Bheadh sé úsáideach a fhios a bheith agat an bhfuil an córas seo in úsáid ag an gcoláiste atá roghnaithe agat sula ndéanann tú iarratas a chur isteach
The Qualifax website has information about mature student entry requirements for full-time undergraduate courses
Tá eolas faoi riachtanais iontrála do mhic léinn aibí ar shuíomh gréasáin Qualifax
In some cases, you may be asked to take an entrance exam
I gcásanna áirithe d'fhéadfaí iarraidh ort scrúdú iontrála a dhéanamh
You will not have to pay fees in publically funded colleges if you qualify for the Free Fees Initiative
Ní bheidh ort táillí a íoc i gcoláistí atá á gcistiú go poiblí má cháilíonn tú don Tionscnamh Saortháillí
However, you will have to pay the student contribution unless you also qualify for the student grant
Beidh ort an ranníocaíocht mhac léinn a íoc, áfach, murar féidir leat cáiliú don deontas mac léinn
You should also find out if you qualify for the Back to Education Allowance
Ba cheart duit a dheimhniú, chomh maith, an gcáilíonn tú don Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas
If you are planning to study at a private third-level college, however, you will be charged fees
Má tá sé i gceist agat staidéar a dhéanamh ag coláiste príobháideach tríú leibhéal, ar ndóigh, beidh táillí le n-íoc agat
These vary from college to college
Tá éagsúlacht idir choláistí maidir lena gcuid táillí
You can apply for tax relief if you are paying for the course from your own income or another person can claim if they are paying fees on your behalf
Is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanmah ar faoiseamh chánach má tá tú ag íoc ar an gcúrsa as d'ioncam féin, nó is féidir le do chéile éileamh a dhéanamh má tá sé/sí ag íoc thar do cheann
Part-time, modular and distance education
Oideachas páirtaimseartha, modúla agus cianoideachais
You will have to pay fees for all part-time, modular and distance education courses
Beidh ort táillí a íoc ar gach cúrsa páirtaimseartha, cúrsa modúla nó cúrsa cianoideachais
The costs vary from course to course
Tá costais éagsúla ar na cúrsaí éagsúla
However, you may apply for tax relief if you are participating on an approved course
Is féidir iarratas a dhéanamh, áfach, ar faoiseamh chánach a fháil má tá tú ag glacadh páirte i gcúrsa aitheanta ar feadh 2 bliana ar a laghad agus tú ag íoc as d'ioncam féin
In order to apply for a third-level course as a mature student, you should first contact the college of your choice directly and send them an up-to-date curriculum vitae (CV)
Ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh díreach leis an gcoláiste atá roghnaithe agat, agus Curriculum Vitae (C.V.) suas chun dáta a chur chucu, chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar áit mar mac léinn aibí
Some colleges require you to apply through the Central Applications Office and you must apply before 1 February of the year you start your course
I gcás coláistí áirithe bíonn ort iarratas a dhéanamh tríd an gcóras CAO

You will be in competition with other mature students for a place on the course so make sure to include as much detail as possible regarding your educational background, work experience and other interests
Beidh tú san iomaíocht le mic léinn aibí eile agus mar sin bí cinnte go bhfuil do chúlra oideachais, taithí oibre agus na rudaí eile a chuireann tú suim iontu luaite go sonrach ann
If your CV gets through the first part of the application procedure, you will be called for interview
Má théann do C.V. tríd an gcéad chuid den chóras cuirfear glaoch ort chuig agallamh
At this point, you may be asked to bring along work that shows your aptitude for the course in question or you may be required to sit an aptitude test
Ag an bpointe seo d'fhéadfaí iarraidh ort sampla de do chuid oibre a thaispeánann do chumas i leith an chúrsa áirithe a thabhairt leat nó d'fhéadfaí iarraidh ort dul faoi scrúdú chumais
You can find detailed information about college requirements and supports for mature students in the Mature Student Directory of Irish Third-Level Institutions (pdf)
Tá faisnéis faoi riachtanais agus tacaíocht do mhic léinn aibí sa Mature Students Directory of Irish Third-Level Institutions (pdf)
